FluidSystem

Class FluidSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • FluidSystem.FluidSolver

  • public class FluidSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    FluidSolver provides an interface for the MSAFluidSolver2D lib.
    See Also:
    MSAFluidSolver2D

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the current system. Next iteration of forces and colors will be computes (if theirs enabled).

        delta - Force to add

        hue - Hue of the dye

        public void reset()
        Reset the current system. All forces and colors will be reset.
